author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1071: Adds best site url matching. Also adds basic/form-based authentication JSP examples inside j2-admin to be used in the example SSO Reverse Proxy IFrame portlets.

author: woonsan
msg: APA-17: Adds variable expanding feature, allowing ${serverName}, ${serverPort} and ${contextPath} for SRC, PROXYREMOTEURL, PROXYLOCALPATH preference values, in order to make it easy to set local server paths.
Also, changes the argument type of siteURI from URI to String.

author: bodewig
msg: put BSF3 build into a sandbox until we know what it wants to depend on

author: dwoods
msg: update to use genesis-2.0 and publish to nexus

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-2041 fixed some bundle version issues of the camel features
